mcd-bogo.title: Buy 1 Get 1 Free - Any Sandwich
mcd-bogo.description: Buy one sandwich, get one of equal or lesser value free. Show coupon to cashier. One redemption per customer.

mcd-10off.title: 10% Off Any Order
mcd-10off.description: Save 10% on any order. Show coupon to cashier. One redemption per customer.

wendys-freeitem.title: Free Side with Any Entrée
wendys-freeitem.description: Get a free side with any entrée purchase. One redemption per customer.

tacobell-drink.title: Free 16 oz Drink with Sandwich
tacobell-drink.description: Free 16 oz drink with any sandwich. One redemption per customer.

popeyes-dessert.title: Free Dessert with Entrée
popeyes-dessert.description: Enjoy a free dessert with the purchase of any entrée. One redemption per customer.

tacobell-bogo-frisco123.title: Buy 1 Get 1 Free – Any Entrée
tacobell-bogo-frisco123.description: Buy one entrée, get one of equal or lesser value free. Show coupon to cashier. One redemption per customer. Not valid with other offers.
